message.content:
Subject: Notice of Departure from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. After much thought and consideration, I have decided to accept a new opportunity that will allow me to further develop my skills and expand my professional horizons. Therefore, it is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of my decision to leave [Company Name]. My last day at the company will be [Date].

I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities you have provided me during my time here. Your guidance and support have been invaluable in helping me grow both personally and professionally. I am truly grateful to have worked with such an amazing team, and I will cherish the friendships and memories made during my tenure at [Company Name].

To ensure a smooth transition, I would like to offer my assistance in finding and training a suitable replacement. Please let me know how I can best support the team during this time. Additionally, I am happy to provide any necessary documentation or information regarding ongoing projects and client relationships.

Looking forward, I hope we can maintain a positive relationship as we both continue on our individual career paths. If there is ever anything I can do for you in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Thank you once again for everything. It has been an honor and privilege working with you at [Company Name].

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
